Boost Log Library Documentation

Version 1.4

Rationale

Boost Log being a separate library (buildable with bjam)
The Boost Log library is shipped as a separate library - you need to compile its source files, which will in turn build a library file that will be statically (or dynamically) linked to your executable at linking. The sole reason for providing this was compilation-time speed.

Had everything been provided in header files, compilation-times could grow 5-10 times or more.
